ygData.subject: Re: Bathory
ygData.msgSnippet: After starting a bard character I came to the realization that the sk is indeed quite weak.  These guys have a song that greatly increases DEX and STR,  making
ygData.messageBody:
After starting a bard character I came to the realization that the sk is indeed quite weak. These guys have a song that greatly increases DEX and STR, making them great melee characters. I think my level 5 guy is about at the level my level 7 sk was. If you think the classes are balanced try verifying this by playing other classes. Sure the sk may have potential at higher levels, but it will take longer to get there.

What I would want is to get a lifetap like spell (for healing), and a rapid movement type spell (for running away from kos npc's) at about level 15 if not sooner. I know we get these eventually, but at the level we do they won't be quite as necessary.
